TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You take the laptop into a plane. Now it's 1000 km/h fast.

I wish Mozilla were more stable with 1097 pages opened at once.

Granted. But only at 1097 pages. Any other page number and Firefox crashes.

I wish I was better at programming.

Granted you are now the best in the world at IPL (developed in 1954)

I wish I was better at java

Granted. You are given a Javanese language course.

I wish I hadn't started playing this game.

Granted.
You wake up on a small green planet near a pack of buildings and a launchpad.
This is your native planet - Kerbin, and you have never heard about KSP.

I wish Earth in RSS were from another geological epoch to avoid nowaday superstitons, limitations and associations.

Granted.

You got a brand (old) new Earth. Oh, and some primal tribal cases and wooden canoes as your space center.

I wish I could fly the perfect space shuttle.

Edited September 5, 2017 by HerrCrazi

Granted, but you have to land it without an atmosphere.

 

I wich I understood the answer to life, the universe, and everything.

Edited September 5, 2017 by Physics Student

Granted, but you are unable to tell anyone what you've discovered, as they don't understand, and you are forever alone

I wish my brother would stop complaining about how he needs a new computer (hint: mine is older and the battery just went out)

Sorry, gotta do this.

Granted, your brother just died.

I wish this thread would just end.

Unfortunately, it's unfortunate.

I wish a wish so remote it doesn't matter what it turns out to be.

Granted. You find a remote control.

I wish for an old grimoire with program sources.

You become corrupted.

I wish for Danny to come back.

Granted, but his videos are now terrible

I wish KSP would suddenly sell like Minecraft, so there is a bigger community

What in the world is a nooblet, but anyway I'll try this out. Granted, but Kirby gets spontaneously destroyed by something out of nowhere. 

 

 I wish I was a dubstep artist  

 

 LOL, I THOUGHT PAGE 6 WAS THE LAST!

 

 Granted, but then the developers left the game because they didn't have any ideas left and they had money.

 

 I wish I was a dubstep artist

Edited September 7, 2017 by Glitchgamer12

Granted. You are now painting dubstep drums for food.

I wish Kerbals could build structures like in Minecraft.

Granted, but they build wither statues that destroys the entire world.

 

I wish I could make the best sandwich

Granted.
All your further life you are trying to make the best sandwich ever, but stay unsatisfied until the very last one, which you have no more time to taste.

I wish there were long-range lasers in BDArmory.

Granted. But they need 100000000 EU/tick.

I wish I could be a talented plane designer. (Truely not possible.)

Granted. Now you are a talented designer of paper planes.

I wish I could go to Duna without problems.

Granted.
You successfully appear on Duna (aka Arrakis) and immediately get captured by a freemen tribe, which is going to extract the water from your body.

I wish BDArmory had nuke-powered gamma-lasers, too.

Granted, but you couldn't get to them in time because they were considered too OP

 I wish I could wish the continued wishes of the wish continuum.

Granted! But unfortunately i couldn't quite understand what you meant, so you get an old sandwich and a pat on the back 

i wish for a zerg drone.

Granted. But you neighbor divorced with her petty tyrant and instead adopted a pet tyranid.

I have no wish at the moment, because any wish is a way to the realm of Slaanesh.

Granted, your wish is a 404 error.

I wish for a Nintendo Switch.

Granted. You have a complete set of Nintendo switches.

Spoiler

I wish you'll get the rest parts of Nintendo soon.
